Articles.Content:
I asked a question in the IFS thread yesterday but I found out almost nobody replies since the last few weeks.

Installing Realism overhaul turns the making history parts into structural pieces, i can't recall any information that MH is unsupported by RO, so,  is it?

I thought that by using interstellar fuel switch I could just edit the tanks regardless, but as it turns out, the parts aren't recognized as fuel tanks at all.

This is spiteful because many of the realism overhaul cockpits have the 1.875m attachment nodes and while I do use Procedural parts which I'm not fan of but seems mandatory for RSS/RO I definitely like the extra variety of the MH parts.

Is there a patch in and of itself or a config line I could add to the MH parts to make them work as fuel tanks?

I think you are refering to the scriot that allows you to configure fuel tanks with a different configuration. IFS dusables itself whenerver id detect another fuel switchhing patmodule on a part. This is probably the case here. Yuo should still b able to use the Dedicated IFS tanks if you installed the full version.
